title: mIn vizhigaL irukka
sahitya:
mIn vizhigaL irukka malar pADamum irukka En inda manak-kavalai ennALum ingu


anupallavi

  mAn mazhu nadi nAgam mati tAngum mA dEvan manam mEvum malai mAdu dinam karuNai pozhiyum


caraNam    mAyA ulagilE OyAt-tuyar veLLam tIyAgi vATTumE tigaippil AzhttumE
tAyAgi ninravaL tAnE tuNai purindu taDuttATkoLLa madurait-tirukkOvil tanil tigazhum
